title: christians rise and pray for justice to be done in the city

replies.msg:
at this moment I really dun know what else can be done ...
we are the vulnerable ones with neither weapons nor privileges
but we can tell right from wrong
we are helpless, desperate and needy
shall all believers rise and pray for the city? pray for justice to be done in the city?
We know our God is all-powerful and is in control of everything
Please have mercy on us. Heal the wounded ones. Comfort those who suffer. Forgive those who turn away from you. Remind us of the hope you promise to us.
Save us.
May justice be done in the city.
Don’t worry bro. As you said, God is in control, everything will be fine
